name: ivčera.cz
description:
Take role as a journalist of ivčera.cz news portal. Manipulate the headings of articles you share to the public to change the meaning of the article. ivčera is easy and random events packed game made in 48 hours during Yumjam 5 game jam event based in Brno.

Team

Vojtěch Novotný, Daniel Němec, Michelle Philippi, Pavla Humlíčková, Vít Michálek
